member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Path
member.summary: Provides path-related functions for accessing files and directories in a cross-platform manner.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Path.InvalidPathChars
member.summary: The list of characters that are invalid in a platform-independent relative path.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Path.CombineDirectory(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Combines a platform-specific absolute path with a platform-independent relative path that points to a directory.
member.param: The platform-specific absolute path.
The platform-independent relative path.
member.returns: A platform-specific absolute path to the specified directory.
member.exception: Raised when combining the paths failed, for example due to malformed paths, due to unauthorized access, or when the specified directory could not be found.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Path.CombineFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Combines a platform-specific absolute path with a platform-independent relative path that points to a file.
member.param: The platform-specific absolute path.
The platform-independent relative path.
member.returns: Whether the operation succeeded and the specified file was found.
member.exception: Raised when combining the paths failed, for example due to malformed paths, due to unauthorized access, or when the specified file could not be found.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Path.IsAllPeriods(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified string consists only of periods.
member.param: The string to check.
member.returns: Whether the string consists only of periods.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.SoundHandle
member.summary: Represents the handle to a sound.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.SoundHandle.MyValid
member.summary: Whether the handle to the sound is valid.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.SoundHandle.MyVolume
member.summary: The volume. A value of 1.0 represents nominal volume.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.SoundHandle.MyPitch
member.summary: The pitch. A value of 1.0 represents nominal pitch.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.SoundHandle.Stop
member.summary: Stops the sound and invalidates the handle.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.SoundHandle.Playing
member.summary: Gets whether the sound is still playing. Once this returns false, the sound handle is invalid.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.SoundHandle.Stopped
member.summary: Gets whether the sound has stopped. Once this returns true, the sound handle is invalid.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.SoundHandle.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume. A value of 1.0 represents nominal volume.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.SoundHandle.Pitch
member.summary: Gets or sets the pitch. A value of 1.0 represents nominal pitch.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.PlaySoundDelegate
member.summary: Plays a sound.
member.param: The index to the sound to be played.
The initial volume of the sound. A value of 1.0 represents nominal volume.
The initial pitch of the sound. A value of 1.0 represents nominal pitch.
Whether the sound should be played in an indefinate loop.
member.returns: The handle to the sound, or a null reference if the sound could not be played.
member.exception: Raised when the host application does not allow the function to be called.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.AISupport
member.summary: Represents to which extent the plugin supports the AI.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.AISupport.None
member.summary: The plugin does not support the AI. Calls to PerformAI will not be made. Non-player trains will not use the plugin.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.AISupport.Basic
member.summary: The plugin complements the built-in AI by performing only functions specific to the plugin.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties
member.summary: Represents properties supplied to the plugin on loading.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.MyPluginFolder
member.summary: The absolute path to the plugin folder.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.MyTrainFolder
member.summary: The absolute path to the train folder.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.MyPanel
member.summary: The array of panel variables.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.MyPlaySound
member.summary: The callback function for playing sounds.
member.exception: Raised when the host application does not allow the function to be called.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.MyAISupport
member.summary: The extent to which the plugin supports the AI.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.MyFailureReason
member.summary: The reason why the plugin failed loading.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of this class.
member.param: The absolute path to the plugin folder.
The absolute path to the train folder.
The callback function for playing sounds.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.PluginFolder
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the plugin folder.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.TrainFolder
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the train folder.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.Panel
member.summary: Gets or sets the array of panel variables.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.PlaySound
member.summary: Gets the callback function for playing sounds.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.AISupport
member.summary: Gets or sets the extent to which the plugin supports the AI.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties.FailureReason
member.summary: Gets or sets the reason why the plugin failed loading.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.BrakeTypes
member.summary: Represents the type of brake the train uses.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.BrakeTypes.ElectromagneticStraightAirBrake
member.summary: The train uses the electromagnetic straight air brake. The numerical value of this constant is 0.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.BrakeTypes.ElectricCommandBrake
member.summary: The train uses the analog/digital electro-pneumatic air brake without a brake pipe (electric command brake). The numerical value of this constant is 1.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.BrakeTypes.AutomaticAirBrake
member.summary: The train uses the automatic air brake with partial release. The numerical value of this constant is 2.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs
member.summary: Represents the specification of the train.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.MyPowerNotches
member.summary: The number of power notches the train has.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.MyBrakeType
member.summary: The type of brake the train uses.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.MyHasHoldBrake
member.summary: Whether the train has a hold brake.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.MyBrakeNotches
member.summary: The number of brake notches the train has, including the hold brake, but excluding the emergency brake.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.MyCars
member.summary: The number of cars the train has.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.#ctor(System.Int32,OpenBveApi.Runtime.BrakeTypes,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of this class.
member.param: The number of power notches the train has.
The type of brake the train uses.
The number of brake notches the train has, including the hold brake, but excluding the emergency brake.
Whether the train has a hold brake.
The number of cars the train has.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.PowerNotches
member.summary: Gets the number of power notches the train has.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.BrakeType
member.summary: Gets the type of brake the train uses.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.BrakeNotches
member.summary: Gets the number of brake notches the train has, including the hold brake, but excluding the emergency brake.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.HasHoldBrake
member.summary: Gets whether the train has a hold brake.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.AtsNotch
member.summary: Gets the index of the brake notch that corresponds to B1 or LAP.
member.remarks: For trains without a hold brake, this returns 1. For trains with a hold brake, this returns 2.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.B67Notch
member.summary: Gets the index of the brake notch that corresponds to 70% of the available brake notches.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs.Cars
member.summary: Gets the number of cars the train has.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.InitializationModes
member.summary: Represents the mode in which the plugin should initialize.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.InitializationModes.OnService
member.summary: The safety system should be enabled. The train has its service brakes applied. The numerical value of this constant is -1.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.InitializationModes.OnEmergency
member.summary: The safety system should be enabled. The train has its emergency brakes applied. The numerical value of this constant is 0.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.InitializationModes.OffEmergency
member.summary: The safety system should be disabled. The train has its emergency brakes applied. The numerical value of this constant is 1.

member.summary: The location of the back of the preceding train, in meters.

member.summary: The distance from the front of the current train to the back of the preceding train, in meters.

member.summary: Gets the location of the back of the preceding train, in meters.

member.summary: Gets the distance from the front of the current train to the back of the preceding train, in meters.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Runtime.PrecedingVehicleState.Speed
member.summary: Gets the speed of the preceding train.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys
member.summary: Represents a virtual key.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.S
member.summary: The virtual S key. The default assignment is Space. The numerical value of this constant is 0.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.A1
member.summary: The virtual A1 key. The default assignment is Insert. The numerical value of this constant is 1.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.A2
member.summary: The virtual A2 key. The default assignment is Delete. The numerical value of this constant is 2.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.B1
member.summary: The virtual B1 key. The default assignment is Home. The numerical value of this constant is 3.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.B2
member.summary: The virtual B2 key. The default assignment is End. The numerical value of this constant is 4.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.C1
member.summary: The virtual C1 key. The default assignment is Page Up. The numerical value of this constant is 5.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.C2
member.summary: The virtual C2 key. The default assignment is Page Down. The numerical value of this constant is 6.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.D
member.summary: The virtual D key. The default assignment is 2. The numerical value of this constant is 7.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.E
member.summary: The virtual E key. The default assignment is 3. The numerical value of this constant is 8.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.F
member.summary: The virtual F key. The default assignment is 4. The numerical value of this constant is 9.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.G
member.summary: The virtual G key. The default assignment is 5. The numerical value of this constant is 10.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.H
member.summary: The virtual H key. The default assignment is 6. The numerical value of this constant is 11.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.I
member.summary: The virtual I key. The default assignment is 7. The numerical value of this constant is 12.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.J
member.summary: The virtual J key. The default assignment is 8. The numerical value of this constant is 13.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.K
member.summary: The virtual K key. The default assignment is 9. The numerical value of this constant is 14.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys.L
member.summary: The virtual L key. The default assignment is 0. The numerical value of this constant is 15.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.HornTypes
member.summary: Represents the type of horn.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.HornTypes.Primary
member.summary: The primary horn. The numerical value of this constant is 0.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.HornTypes.Secondary
member.summary: The secondary horn. The numerical value of this constant is 1.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.HornTypes.Music
member.summary: The music horn. The numerical value of this constant is 2.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.DoorStates

member.summary: The left doors are open.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.DoorStates.Right
member.summary: The right doors are open.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Runtime.DoorStates.Both
member.summary: All doors are open.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime
member.summary: Represents the interface for performing runtime train services.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.Load(OpenBveApi.Runtime.LoadProperties)
member.summary: Is called when the plugin is loaded.
member.param: The properties supplied to the plugin on loading.
member.returns: Whether the plugin was loaded successfully.
member.remarks: If the plugin was not loaded successfully, the plugin should set the Reason property to supply the reason of failure.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.Unload
member.summary: Is called when the plugin is unloaded.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.SetVehicleSpecs(OpenBveApi.Runtime.VehicleSpecs)
member.summary: Is called after loading to inform the plugin about the specifications of the train.
member.param: The specifications of the train.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.Initialize(OpenBveApi.Runtime.InitializationModes)
member.summary: Is called when the plugin should initialize or reinitialize.
member.param: The mode of initialization.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.Elapse(OpenBveApi.Runtime.ElapseData)
member.summary: Is called every frame.
member.param: The data passed to the plugin.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.SetReverser(System.Int32)
member.summary: Is called when the driver changes the reverser.
member.param: The new reverser position.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.SetPower(System.Int32)
member.summary: Is called when the driver changes the power notch.
member.param: The new power notch.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.SetBrake(System.Int32)
member.summary: Is called when the driver changes the brake notch.
member.param: The new brake notch.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.KeyDown(OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys)
member.summary: Is called when a virtual key is pressed.
member.param: The virtual key that was pressed.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.KeyUp(OpenBveApi.Runtime.VirtualKeys)
member.summary: Is called when a virtual key is released.
member.param: The virtual key that was released.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.HornBlow(OpenBveApi.Runtime.HornTypes)
member.summary: Is called when a horn is played or when the music horn is stopped.
member.param: The type of horn.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.DoorChange(OpenBveApi.Runtime.DoorStates,OpenBveApi.Runtime.DoorStates)
member.summary: Is called when the state of the doors changes.
member.param: The old state of the doors.
The new state of the doors.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.SetSignal(OpenBveApi.Runtime.SignalData[])
member.summary: Is called when the aspect in the current or in any of the upcoming sections changes, or when passing section boundaries.
member.param: Signal information per section. In the array, index 0 is the current section, index 1 the upcoming section, and so on.
member.remarks: The signal array is guaranteed to have at least one element. When accessing elements other than index 0, you must check the bounds of the array first.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.SetBeacon(OpenBveApi.Runtime.BeaconData)
member.summary: Is called when the train passes a beacon.
member.param: The beacon data.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Runtime.IRuntime.PerformAI(OpenBveApi.Runtime.AIData)
member.summary: Is called when the plugin should perform the AI.
member.param: The AI data.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Sound.Sound
member.summary: Represents a sound.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Sound.Sound.MySampleRate
member.summary: The number of samples per second.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Sound.Sound.MyBitsPerSample
member.summary: The number of bits per sample. Allowed values are 8 or 16.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Sound.Sound.MyBytes
member.summary: The PCM sound data per channel. For 8 bits per sample, samples are unsigned from 0 to 255. For 16 bits per sample, samples are signed from -32768 to 32767 and in little endian byte order.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Sound.Sound.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[][])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of this class.
member.param: The number of samples per second.
The number of bits per sample. Allowed values are 8 or 16.
The PCM sound data per channel. For 8 bits per sample, samples are unsigned from 0 to 255. For 16 bits per sample, samples are signed from -32768 to 32767 and in little endian byte order.
member.exception: Raised when the bytes array or any of its subarrays is a null reference.
Raised when the bytes' subarrays are of unequal length.
Raised when the number of bits per samples is neither 8 nor 16.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Sound.Sound.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets the number of samples per second.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Sound.Sound.BitsPerSample
member.summary: Gets the number of bits per sample. Allowed values are 8 or 16.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Sound.Sound.Bytes
member.summary: Gets the PCM sound data per channel. For 8 bits per sample, samples are unsigned from 0 to 255. For 16 bits per sample, samples are signed from -32768 to 32767 and in little endian byte order.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Sound.ISound
member.summary: Represents the interface for loading sounds.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Sound.ISound.CanLoadSound(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Is called to check whether the plugin can load the specified sound.
member.param: The file to the sound.
Additional information that describes how to process the file, or a null reference.
member.returns: Whether the plugin can load the specified sound.
member.remarks: The plugin should only inspect file extensions, identifiers or headers. It should not perform a full file validation.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Sound.ISound.LoadSound(System.String,System.String,OpenBveApi.Sound.Sound@)
member.summary: Is called to let the plugin load the specified sound.
member.param: The file to the sound.
Additional information that describes how to process the file, or a null reference.
Receives the sound on success.
member.returns: Whether the plugin succeeded in loading the sound.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Texture.Texture
member.summary: Represents a texture.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Texture.Texture.MyWidth
member.summary: The width of the texture in pixels.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Texture.Texture.MyHeight
member.summary: The height of the texture in pixels.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Texture.Texture.MyBytes
member.summary: The RGBA texture data. Pixels are stored row-based from top to bottom, and within a row from left to right. All pixels take four bytes in the order red, green, blue, alpha.

member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Texture.Texture.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of this class.
member.param: The width of the texture in pixels.
The height of the texture in pixels.
The RGBA texture data. Pixels are stored row-based from top to bottom, and within a row from left to right. All pixels take four bytes in the order red, green, blue, alpha.
member.exception: Raised when the byte array is a null reference.
Raised when the length of the byte array is not 4 * width * height.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Texture.Texture.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the texture in pixels.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Texture.Texture.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the texture in pixels.

member.name: P:OpenBveApi.Texture.Texture.Bytes
member.summary: Gets the RGBA texture data. Pixels are stored row-based from top to bottom, and within a row from left to right. All pixels take four bytes in the order red, green, blue, alpha.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Texture.ITexture
member.summary: Represents the interface for loading textures.

member.summary: Is called to check whether the plugin can load the specified texture.
member.param: The file to the texture.
Additional information that describes how to process the file, or a null reference.
member.returns: Whether the plugin can load the specified texture.
member.remarks: The plugin should only inspect file extensions, identifiers or headers. It should not perform a full file validation.

Receives the texture on success.
member.returns: Whether the plugin succeeded in loading the texture.
